comments.body: The allay won. The copper golem will never be added.

As mojang have said over the years, the minecraft mob vote mobs will someday be added, the mob vote is just what you want in the game right now.

With that being said I don't think it is coming anytime soon although I, and so many people in the minecraft community would like it soon.
i dont like how high up the jump button is i liked the old jump button other then that everything else is good
We also need a way to switch items easier because the hot bas is so far away from all the other controls, all we would need is two buttons with the rest to move one item over to the left or right
I have Minecraft story mode on a old device but I tried to create a account but it didn't work and I got so sad because I can't play a version of the game i love
Cool Idea. I really like this and honestly think it should be in the game. Advancement/Achievement Update Pls?
Just added touch screen controls to Java just like PE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
What happens to people who bought both? Would they get a refund? Minecoins? A cape?
Peple who bouth bouth shoud get aighter a re fund aighter minecouns or something
your wish has been granted

First, I'm pretty sure they do. Second, by posting it on this website, you probably give them legal permission to use this idea as their own. Third, just because you had the same idea as them (and posted it here) doesn't really mean that they used your idea. (great minds think alike) Finally, they have given recognition to other people in the past, they probably will continue to in the future. (ie. the guy who created the mo'creatures mod both got a job and got a cape)
I don't know why

Building is part of Minecraft. Decorative blocks are GOOD. So what if your inventory fills up? Just throw stuff out. And there are Villagers that will give you Emeralds for those kinds of blocks, so they're not that useless.

Oh, okay... so don't mine in a straight line. Okay, there goes any form of organized mining. Bye bye strip mining.

(No offense...)

Being able to play Minecraft at a high resolution and doing a 360-degree turn without getting tangled in cords is revolutionary. You already have the Gear VR app working, all you gotta do is add better support and keep up with updates. The first game anyone would buy on their VR headset would be Minecraft. Living in the Minecraft world you usually stare at would be an instant purchase. Please make your Gear VR application work on the Quest.

Exactly, why Migrate. Plus you're ruining technik launchers etc. The hell, we can't even play with our friend who just bought minecraft, cuz its on god damn microduck account. Which isn't support and why would be even? It's working, leave that alone, are you trying to ruin another thing. Let ppl make their own decision if they want microduck account, or Mojang WHICH is supporting modding.
Completely agree.
i 10000000% agree. i dont want all this paying stuff. and I HATE LOGGING INTO MICROSFT ACCOUNTS
The minecraft is very very goods in world
Perhaps these icons could be the ones you set for your instance in the launcher? That would be cool!
yes
This is a great suggestion. A cape for players who purchased and played a legacy console edition of the game. A commemorative cape to honor 4Jstudios.
maybe a MC dungeons DLC

I would have a Squid Uprising April Fools Update where squids can be milked (either for milk or ink) which will make them hostile. Squids could fly, shoot Guardian lasers, etc. Giant Squids (Krakens) could be added as well as Gillagers, who could be Villagers with Squids for heads or Squids with villager noses. The entire world could also be filled with water
Maybe this is a web browser game where you must help M.A.R.I.L.L.A stop the squid uprising
That is the best thing I have heard! I honestly love the Minecraft Franchise and would love if there was a Themepark!
I have a name for it: Mineland!

eh, I prefer having steam integration for bedrock edition.
However, you do have a good point about paying for both versions. I would like Java Edition to have a lower price and for bedrock to have a fixed price for all versions (switch could do this by being digital only, since physical copies would make it cost $80).

I think the parity is a good idea, especially for players (like me) who can only play Bedrock because they can't afford a PC or the other way around. I think it's fine just the way it is, and the games should keep having the same features.

Unfortunately i disagree. I think parity should continue so minecraft and minecraft java have the best of both worlds. More
fun for more
people ^_^

I think that parity should be done since I can’t play with my friends on iOS if I got Java so I play Bedrock. Also, my friends on Bedrock want things that are on Java but can’t get a PC so it would be a shame for them if parity was stopped.
Hey y’all! I think instead of paritying, we should 100% give java edition more it’s unique features and give bedrock edition its unique features.

Who voted for this this is totally the worst suggestion in all of the feedback website because

  • Minecraft java and bedrock are not two different games they are the same game but with different codebases
  • Some people can only afford one version
  • Some people like good features because most of bedrock exclusive features are really the nonexistence or the java features.

That is why this is a very bad post I will not vote.

I understand some people have a different opinion then me... all I’m saying is I feel I deserve a refund if you make both games exactly the same. It ain’t fair to me nor is it fair to other players who have purchased both versions. I spent a good $50 for a $20 game due to the unique features of each.

Unpopular opinion: if the 2 games ever do reach complete parity (highly unlikely), one of them would eventually get discontinued. It'd be like having to develop the exact same game twice for 2 different codebases, which not only divides the team but also forces them to work in sync and constantly communicate changes so it doesn't break parity.

Despite this I still really, really want parity between the 2 versions. Even if I "lose" what I paid for one of them if it does get discontinued way down the line, unifying the fanbase on all platforms and also improving the experience all around would make it more than worth it IMO.

And besides, what you bought was the game as it was with no guarantee of future updates, the fact that the updates are all free and that we are still getting them is a massive bonus. In no way does it warrant you a refund even if they make both games effectively the same.
Mojang don't do this because this man is mad we want more java parity
Sorry but I disagree :| They really should make the two of them cross play and with the same features. More fun for more people
The two versions are incapable of crossplay. It's not my opinion, they're made in different coding languages.
Stupid idea, why would you hinder progress? I wanna play on Java servers

I think the opposite, java and bedrock should grow closer until they merge into one.  Check out my post for more: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360077418091-The-Parity-Update

They are, however, meant to represent one and the same game. Talking about this the way you do means you do not understand what you are talking about and you could compare it to people who whine that they got rare achievements in the game and they have been made easier to get for other people or other similar nonsense. You can not reasonably expect to be granted the right to a refund just because you prefer feature exclusivity of one version/edition over the other. What this means, is that they should absolutely get the same features and the fact it is taking so long and that they deliberately do not want to introduce proper changes to one edition or the other when it comes to different parts of those editions (I won't be calling them separate games) such as the infamous redstone working entirely different on Bedrock just because "it is the way redstone was originally supposed to be anyway" is sickening. No one will give you a refund if you get mad at developers for making the game one and the same as it was always supposed to be in the first place, because demanding a refund for this type of thing is bonkers, baseless and does not break any law under which you would be eligible for a refund. Please get back to Earth's orbit and rethink what you have just said over.
对不起，我无法支持您。这两个版本只是代码不同。基石版本是 C++，而 Java 是在 Java 中创建的。他们是同一个游戏。
I completely disagree and hope people on bedrock and java can play together nonmatter  what device there on
HARD disagree on this. Sorry.
i would be surprised if they didn't
